titleStmt.title: A true relation of the fight between Maior Gen. Lambert, and the Scots army neer Appleby, Iuly 24. 1648. With a letter written from Colonell Charles Fairfax, touching the surrender of Thornhill House in Yorkshire, with all the armes and ammunition therein, for the service of the Parliament. Written to a member of the House of Commons. With the summons, answers, and replies from the said Colonel, and Governor thereof.
titleStmt.author: Paulden, Thomas, 1626-ca. 1710.
Fairfax, Charles, 1597-1673.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
